text: North Korea opens a housing district for families of its soldiers killed in Russia-Ukraine war - AP News
fullText: North Korea says it completed a housing district in Pyongyang for families of soldiers killed while fighting alongside Russian forces in Ukraine. It's the latest effort by leader Kim Jong Un to honor the war dead. State media photos showed Kim Jong Un walking…

text: Measles exposure reported at Philadelphia International Airport - 6abc Philadelphia
fullText: The Philadelphia Department of Public Health is warning travelers about a measles exposure at Philadelphia International Airport.

text: Alibaba Leads Tech Slide After Pentagon Briefly Shows Blacklist - Bloomberg.com
fullText: Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. led a Chinese tech-share selloff after the Pentagon added some of the country’s biggest names to a list of companies aiding the military — only to withdraw that roster minutes later without explanation.

text: Israel bombs Lebanon-Syria border, kills four people - Al Jazeera

text: Europe looks to shore up own defenses amid US uncertainty - DW.com
fullText: NATO remains a vital security umbrella for Europe, but self-reliance and mutual defense was a recurring theme for the continent's leaders during the annual Munich Security Conference.

text: Japan's economy avoids technical recession, but fourth-quarter rebound misses expectations - CNBC

text: Human "biology was never intended to handle" ultraprocessed foods, former FDA head David Kessler warns - CBS News

text: Hungary: Magyar launches anti-Orban election campaign - DW.com

text: US military boards another oil tanker in Indian Ocean after tracking it from the Caribbean - AP News

fullText: Nobody makes the game of golf look easier than Mr. Scheffler.

text: What is the dart frog toxin allegedly used to kill Alexei Navalny? - BBC
fullText: The toxin, epibatidine, can be found in frogs in the wild in South America or manufactured in a lab.

text: China Built A Shape-Shifting Robot That Can Grow Like A Human - bgr.com
fullText: A new robot out of China can change its shape by inflating or deflating, and its creators hope it can be put to use for search and rescue operations.
